short_summary: Synology NAS or equivalent for Parks Canada
full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement - Synology NAS or Equivalent

#### Solicitation Title and Reference

* **Solicitation Title**: Synology NAS or Equivalent for Parks Canada
* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00024415:T
* **Amendment Number**: 1

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: November 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 14, 2023 00:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: December 12, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified

#### Tender Status and Scope

* **Tender Status**: Expiration Date: December 14, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: Open to Participants from Canada, Goods Subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Procurement Category and Method

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Javier Ventura
* **Contact Email**: [Not Specified]
* **Contact Phone**: 343-576-9329
* **Contact Fax**: 343-576-9329

#### Additional Documentation

* The solicitation package and associated attachments can be accessed on the SSC P2P portal using the following URLs:

  * English: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/8D887810-0A19-46B6-B23F-2EB5EC4FB929, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B6AD82B7-7CBA-42B5-8260-ED9800DED852
  * French: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/1D27B940-1238-409B-B629-993CF3FFF837, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/4924F08D-C436-40A8-8376-9C1BC7409B37

#### Instructions for Bidders

* Potential bidders can register for the SSC P2P portal to view solicitations, submit responses, and receive updates and notifications regarding solicitations.
